inclusion.criterion: Subject with an established diagnosis of T1D for at least three months prior to screening
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Subject with secondary causes of fatty liver including history of any of the following:
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Hepatitis B or C virus infection
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Current or previous use of any of the following medication:
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: amiodarone, tamoxifen, methotrexate,corticosteroids (e.g. Prednisone), or Valproate
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Male subject consuming >30 g of alcohol per day or female subject consuming >20 g of alcohol perday
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has been treating with corticosteroid and cyclophosphamides for 4 months, but there is no indication of malignancy or secondary causes of fatty liver.
